devdoc.author: PoolTogether Inc Team
devdoc.details: This contract does not ensure draw ordering and draws should always be bridged in ascending and contiguous order.

params._drawBuffer: Address of the DrawBuffer onto which draws are pushed
params._drawDispatcher: Address of the DrawDispatcher on the origin chain that dispatch the draws
params._executor: Address of the ERC-5164 contract that executes the bridged calls

pushDraw((uint256,uint32,uint64,uint64,u.details: Only the `executor` is able to call this function.

pushDraws((uint256,uint32,uint64,uint64,.details: Only the `executor` is able to call this function.`draws` must be ordered in ascending and contiguous order.

devdoc.title: PoolTogether V4 DrawExecutor

DrawPushed((uint256,uint32,uint64,uint64.notice: Emitted when the `draw` has been pushed.

DrawsPushed((uint256,uint32,uint64,uint6.notice: Emitted when the `draws` have been pushed.

drawBuffer().notice: DrawBuffer onto which draws are pushed.

drawDispatcher().notice: DrawDispatcher contract on the origin chain that dispatch the draws.

isTrustedExecutor(address).notice: Check which executor this contract trust.

trustedExecutor().notice: Address of the trusted executor contract.

userdoc.notice: The DrawExecutor smart contract relies on ERC-5164 to receive draws from Ethereum         and push them onto the DrawBuffer.
